amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws which provide for the protection of the health of individuals with disabilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 4 and 5 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that the bill would not apply to laws or regulations protecting the health of individuals with disabilities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Owens amendments (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 275 (Roll no. 36).
